nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Graphic Novel Adaptation

Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Graphic Novel Adaptation is a children's graphic novel adapting the events of the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi from author Alessandro Ferrari. It was released by IDW Publishing on October 22, 2019. It was previously published in Star Wars: The Original Trilogy – A Graphic Novel by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
